section.p: You are pious enough to be allowed to enter the sacred grove. You step in and knock on the door.
A kindly old druid opens the door and greets you.
You hand him the (cross it off your Adventure Sheet).
‘Thank you!’ says the druid, ‘An oak staff, eh! That’s an interesting message, to be sure.’

He hands you as payment and a
, saying, ‘Please take this staff to the Oak Druid in the City of Trees, on the Isle of Druids - I’m sure he’ll reward you, too. Good day, and thanks again!’
With that he shuts the door.
You head back into the forest. .
